title: Fixed appliances supplied by a flexible cord and plug top
fullText:
A flexible cord supplying a fixed appliance in a recreational vehicle or non recreational vehicle shall be fitted with a plug top that complies with the requirements of one of the following standards:
(a) AS/NZS 3112; or
(b) AS/NZS 3123; or
(c) IEC 60309-2; or
(d) AS/NZS 3131.
Exception: This clause does not apply to flexible cords provided by the appliance manufacturer attached to the fixed appliance when installed as installation wiring.
